author: By James Wilkinson and Mary Kekatos For Dailymail.com
description: Pharrell, Brad Pitt and Josh Brolin were among the celebrities who arrived at the Hollywood Forever funeral home and cemetery to say farewell to Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell on Friday.
title: Rock royalty attend funeral for Soundgarden's Chris Cornell

author: Jayme Deerwester
description: "I'm sorry you were alone, and I know that was not you, my sweet Christopher," Vicky Cornell wrote a week after Soundgarden singer died in apparent suicide.
title: Chris Cornell's wife Vicky writes letter to late Soundgarden singer

author: Jessica Gibb
description: Soundgarden and Audioslave's Cornell was found hanged at the MGM Grand hotel in Detroit on Thursday
title: Chris Cornell's remains have been cremated during a small private ceremony

author: The Associated Press
description: Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell was laid to rest Friday at Hollywood Forever Cemetery in Los Angeles.
title: Chris Cornell funeral: Dave Grohl, Metallica, Brad Pitt among mourners

description: Musicians, film stars and devastated fans gather at a famous Hollywood cemetery to remember Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell.
title: Rock legends turn out to remember Chris Cornell

description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Late Soundgarden singer Chris Cornell will be laid to rest Friday at a private memorial service at a Hollywood cemetery that is the final resting place of numerous stars. The private service at Hollywood Forever Cemetery will be followed by a public memorial that begins at 3 p.m. PDT, during which fans can view Cornell's burial site. The services come more than a week after the 52-year-old Seattle native was found unresponsive in a Detroit hotel room hours after performing a show with Soundgarden. Coroner's officials have said a preliminary autopsy showed Cornell hanged himself. A full autopsy and results of toxicology tests are pending.
title: Cornell funeral to take place Friday; widow pens letter

author: SANDY COHEN
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Music's elite and Hollywood stars remembered Chris Cornell at a somber memorial service Friday that focused on the Soundgarden frontman's love of family and friends as much as it did on his musical achievements as one of rock's leading voices. "Chris was as melodic as The Beatles, as heavy as Sabbath and as haunting as Edgar Allan Poe," Tom Morello, Cornell's Audioslave bandmate, said during his eulogy. "The demons he wrestled with were real, but he harnessed those demons and rode them like a mother-flipping chariot of lightning strapped with Marshall stacks to make some of the greatest rock 'n' roll of all time."
title: Rocker Chris Cornell remembered as 'voice of our generation'
